body: not that im complaining. but yeah. drawing is hard and sometime u just need money. we know many people do this. but please give us some good dining or just stop. like another author z-ton. he stop make story but when he make one. he make a good one.

and this author became more more of economic purpose author. where he sell for profit not for passion. i see lack of drawing and easier route is novel.
it sad one but oh well hope he will soon reliaze that we need a "fine dining" not "fast food"

it remind me of "tachibana family circumstance" the author and writer got split. end up with some light novel. cause the story was too famous.

so even in doujin, power of economy never stop to eat humanity.
I really want more impregnation ones or the bugs triggering ovulation in the girls you know learning a skill to do it after fucking them for so long
I'm not liking the style you're using in the last installments. He did the same in the last Sasara Kusugawa. I hope and the next one is as they were before.
Why the stupid wall of japanese text every 2 pages? Geez, ruined my fap, this looked pretty hot
